channel.title: NodeJS on MyTechKB
channel.description: Recent content in NodeJS on MyTechKB

item.title: Node Environment
item.description: NodeJS Environment To create a new package.json npm init -y To install a package npm i <package-name> sudo npm i -g nodemon To install a local package.json npm install To run node file node app.js To use nodemon to auto-restart server nodemon app.js
